tasks.title: Background Job Tracking Infrastructure
tasks.description: Implement background job tracking infrastructure to support export operations and other async tasks. This is the foundation for all export system enhancements.
tasks.details: Foundation task for export system enhancements. Implement job queue system, progress tracking, and status monitoring for background operations.

tasks.title: Multiple Export Formats Implementation
tasks.description: Implement support for multiple export formats (CSV, Excel, PDF, JSON) with proper formatting and data structure preservation.
tasks.details: Add support for CSV, Excel, PDF, and JSON export formats. Ensure proper data formatting and structure preservation across all formats.

tasks.title: Scheduled Exports Functionality
tasks.description: Implement scheduled export functionality allowing users to set up recurring exports with customizable schedules and delivery methods.
tasks.details: Enable users to schedule recurring exports with customizable frequency (daily, weekly, monthly) and delivery options (email, download).

tasks.title: Export History Tracking
tasks.description: Implement export history tracking to maintain records of all export operations, including status, timestamps, and download links.
tasks.details: Track all export operations with timestamps, status, file sizes, and provide download links for historical exports.

tasks.title: Detailed Metrics Collection System
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive metrics collection system for monitoring application performance, user behavior, and system health indicators.
tasks.details: Foundation for monitoring enhancements. Collect detailed metrics on performance, usage, errors, and system resources.

tasks.title: Performance Threshold Monitoring
tasks.description: Implement performance threshold monitoring with configurable alerts for response times, error rates, and resource utilization.
tasks.details: Set up configurable performance thresholds and monitoring for response times, error rates, and system resources.
